title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, and delete models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library providing synchronous and async APIs for chatting, generating, embedding, and managing models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as an LLM, chat, and embedding provider for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG, and multi-user workspaces; runs via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder APIs, streaming, and Spring Boot starters for enterprise integrations.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for generating and chatting with Ollama models, supports streaming and model management.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Lightweight CLI wrapper around ollama-js for quick prompts and piping from the terminal without the Go binary.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by the community to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Curated recipes for common Ollama use-cases: PDF chat, function-calling, structured output, Docker Compose stacks, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models to Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-chatbot (Streamlit)
summary: Minimal Streamlit chatbot template that connects to local Ollama and demonstrates session memory and model switching.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Community repo with ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks pairing Ollama with Open-WebUI, Postgres, QDrant, and more.

title: ollama-rag-llamaindex
summary: End-to-end RAG example using LlamaIndex, Ollama embeddings, and any local model for question-answering over documents.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and NixOS module for reproducible Ollama installations including GPU drivers and model caching.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that spins up Ollama containers to run model-based tests or generate docs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with async HTTP client, strongly-typed requests/responses, and minimal dependencies.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for local AI note assistance, summarization, and brainstorming.

title: ollama-gpt-script
summary: GPTScript provider that lets you treat any Ollama model as a tool in GPTScript workflows for automation scripts.
